description:
Serving individuals and families who suffered a serious injury or loss from our law office in Chagrin Falls, Ohio, the attorneys at Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, provide unmatched representation and support to clients throughout Cuyahoga County and beyond who are dealing with serious legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Birth and delivery injuries
  • Vaccine injuries
  • Brain and spinal cord injuries
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Other preventable tragedies

When you work with our law firm, you will receive the benefit of working directly with a top-rated, award-winning trial lawyer who has your best interests at heart. We have gained a reputation for delivering direct, personal service to those we serve, and you can rely on us for honest, straightforward counsel tailored to your specific needs and goals.

Recognized as among the top trial advocates in the country, our law firm's attorneys have earned AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America, including the organization's Lawyer of the Year Award. Having recovered tens of millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, we are also members of the prestigious Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums.

As proud as we are of our accolades, our true measure of success comes from how we treat our clients, and we have received Superb client ratings on Avvo and the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys. In addition, we have also received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, and we are ready to do all we can to help you make your life whole again.

For more information, you can contact Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, to schedule either an in-person free initial consultation or a virtual consultation through phone or video conference.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
